main event: A luminous white object was observed traveling at high speed with no sound for 10-15 minutes near Boerne, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as moving in a straight line at very rapid speed and emitted no sound., A witness reported seeing the object for approximately 10-15 minutes., The object was noted to have a bright orange color, resembling a light bulb in the sky., Witnesses described the object as being round or egg-shaped and not very high in the sky., Similar incidents were reported in the area within the past two years.
witness description: Witnesses described seeing the object at a distance characterized by its bright light and its lack of movement.
